title: Glamorous Italian assistant tied to $100m crypto bros' 'torture chamber' at $75,000-a-month NYC mansion  - where tourist 'was held hostage for his Bitcoin account'
description: Folchi, an aspiring actress who lives in Connecticut , was seen being led out of the brownstone Soho home where the ordeal is alleged to have taken place on Saturday
